message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI

This paper deals with image colorization and video generation, which are both topics within computer vision (cs.CV). The specific application of anime production suggests that graphics (cs.GR) and multimedia (cs.MM) may also be relevant sub-categories. The use of learning-based methods and adversarial training suggests that machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) may also be relevant sub-categories.
